#include <iostream>
using namespace std;
#include<functional>
#include<cstdio>
#include<cmath>
#include<string>
#include<vector>
#include<algorithm>
#define gc getchar_unlocked
#define hi unsigned long long int
inline hi scanint()
    {
      hi n=0,neg=0,c=getchar_unlocked();
      while((c<'0'||c>'9')&&c!='-')c=getchar_unlocked();
      if(c=='-') {neg=1;c=getchar_unlocked();}
      while(c>='0'&&c<='9')n=(n<<3)+(n<<1)+c-'0',c=getchar_unlocked();
      if(neg) n=-n;
      return n;
    }
hi gcd(hi x,hi y)
{
    if(y==0)
     return x;
    else
     return gcd(y,x%y);
}
hi answer(hi a,hi b)
{
 if(b==1)
  return 0;
 else
 {
  hi GCD=gcd(a,b);
  if(GCD==1)
   return 1;
  return answer(a,b/GCD);
 }
}
int main() 
{
	hi t,a,b;
	t=scanint();
	while(t--)
	{
	 a=scanint();   b=scanint();
	 if(answer(a,b))	 
	 printf("No\n");
	 else
	 printf("Yes\n");
	}
	return 0;
}
